subject: Order #SSN4210
description_text:
﻿
﻿
﻿Good morning, I ordered a pro x ultra pedal kit along with Vam motor set on the 30th. Since then I haven’t received any updates. I emailed last week Friday and still haven’t got a response. I’m just trying to see if it can arrive before Christmas. 
Thank you, 
                      Jason Goosby 
Sent from my iPhone

conversations.body_text: ID 为 7517 的工单已合并到此工单。

合并来自工单7517  
      主题: Shipping  
      描述:  Good morning I made an order on the 30th and I haven’t got an update that it has shipped yet. My order number is SSN4210. I was just checking in too make sure it wasn’t lost or something.  Thank you,                        Jason Goosby Sent from my iPhone

Hi Jason Jr Goosby,  We apologize for the shortage during the Black Friday peak season due to limited stock in our US warehouse. I have confirmed with our operations team that a batch of goods has been shipped to the US warehouse via air freight. We will arrange your shipment as soon as possible.

Good morning. I understand thanks for the transparency.
 
Sent from my iPhone

>

Hi Jason Jr Goosby,     We apologize for the inconvenience. Our US warehouse has finally received the shipment, but I noticed your address is in Hawaii. Shipping from the US warehouse incurs a $118 fee. We require you to cover approximately $45 to offset the shipping costs. We appreciate your understanding.

﻿Good morning, 
Can you charge the card I used to place the order for the shipping fee. 
Thank you 
Sent from my iPhone

>
Hi Jason Jr Goosby,    You can pay the shipping fee at this link. Thank you for your understanding.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/difference

Good afternoon,

 I payed the shipping fee.

Thank you 

>
Hi Jason Jr Goosby,    Okay, we've shipped your order and updated the shipping notification.
